name: Justin's Crunchy Classic Peanut Butter 16oz. Jar, Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Responsibly Sourced
short_description: Includes one 16-Ounce Crunchy Peanut Butter Spread Jar, made with a proprietary nut grinding method to deliver incredible texture and taste; try it on crackers, sandwiches, baking, cooking, apples, celery, or just enjoy a spoonful.
Made with only two ingredients, dry roasted peanuts and palm oil.

Our nut butters are made with the highest quality, responsibly sourced ingredients; we give back to support hunger relief, pollinators, invest in sustainable packaging solutions and have environmentally friendly office practices.
Just like the first batch Justin Gold whipped up in his home kitchen, our nut butters use only the best ingredients around.

product_description: Who are we? Well, we seek out the finest natural and organic foods available, maintain the strictest quality standards in the industry, and have an unshakeable commitment to sustainable agriculture. We ban 300+ ingredients from all food that we sell, including hydrogenated fats, high-fructose corn syrup and sweeteners such as aspartame, sucralose and saccharin, so you can skip deciphering ingredient labels and cut to relishing your finds. Our 365 by Whole Foods Market brand offers over 2,500 affordably priced and thoughtfully sourced products that not only meet our already strict standards, but also in many cases go above and beyond what we require of other brands.

name: Simply Jif Creamy Peanut Butter, 15.5 Ounces (Pack fo 1)
short_description: Contains 1- 15.5 Ounce Jar of Simply Jif Creamy Peanut Butter
33% less total sugar than regular Jif Peanut Butter
A gluten-free peanut butter that has 7g protein (7% DV) per serving (See Nutrition Information for Fat and Saturated Fat Content)
Fresh roasted peanut taste and low sodium
SNAP and EBT Eligible Food Item
product_description: From a brand that has been trusted for generations, Simply Jif Creamy Peanut Butter gives you all of the fresh roasted peanut taste you love with 33% less total sugar than regular Jif peanut butter. One bite of our creamy peanut butter and you’ll be reminded of your very best childhood memories. Simply Jif Creamy Peanut Butter is That Jif’ing Good, making it perfect for sandwiches for an afternoon of school and practice, delicious cookies while making memories with family, and of course, delicious bites right from the spoon with this smooth-textured peanut butter. Plus, this peanut butter is low sodium, gluten free and has 7g protein (7% DV) per serving (See Nutrition Information for Fat and Saturated Fat Content). And with a jar of Simply Jif Creamy Peanut Butter Spread, you’ll always have this classic peanut butter treat on hand. Simply Jif peanut butter contains 2g total sugar per serving. Regular Jif peanut butter contains 3g total sugar per serving.

product_description: I like peanut butter so much I dedicated years of my life to creating an entirely new, one-of-a-kind way to make it. I know what you're thinking, how many ways can there be to make peanut butter? Well, there are at least two. What everyone else does and what we do. And I guarantee once you try our way you'll agree it was worth the effort.

product_description: he makers of SKIPPY Creamy Peanut Butter Blended with Plant Protein has been spreading tasty fun to every household since 1933. With 6 simple ingredients, 10 grams of protein, and no preservatives, artificial flavors or colors, this creamy peanut butter is perfect for any snack or part of any meal. From a delicious piece of peanut butter toast, to apples or celery with a peanut buttery dip, the different ways to enjoy SKIPPY peanut butter are endless. So when you're craving an easy, satisfying snack, there's only one thing to do. GO TO YOUR SKIPPY PLACE. Includes one shelf stable, 16 oz plastic jar of SKIPPY Creamy Peanut Butter Blended with Plant Protein.

name: Teddie All Natural Peanut Butter, Smooth, Gluten Free & Vegan, 16 Ounce Glass (Smooth, Pack of 1)
short_description: SMOOTH AND CREAMY - Perfectly grinded peanuts for that truly natural texture
ALL NATURAL - Naturally made and naturally delicious! Teddie Peanut Butter is crafted just the way peanut butter should be
MADE IN USA - Support local communities by choosing Teddie Peanut Butter. Proudly made in Everett, MA, with USA-grown peanuts
VERSATILE SPREAD - Perfect for sandwiches, recipes, or straight from the jar. Enjoy the delightful taste of Teddie Peanut Butter any way you like
GLUTEN FREE AND VEGAN - A safe and perfect choice for those with dietary needs. Ideal for active lifestyles and health-conscious individuals
product_description: Teddie All-Natural Smooth Peanut Butter is a delicious and nutritious peanut butter that available today. Made with just dry roasted peanuts, it comes in SALTED and UNSALTED varieties. Enjoy Teddie on a sandwich, in a smoothie, with dessert or even by the spoonful. If you are not familiar with natural peanut butter, the oil separation occurs naturally. You don’t need to refrigerate Teddie, but to slow the oil separation just stir the jar contents, tighten the cap and then place it in the refrigerator. You may also keep your jar in the pantry at room temperature, but we suggest stirring it before each use to incorporate the oil back into the peanut butter.
